scripts.cap:build: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.android:build: npm run cap:build && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.android:release: npm run cap:build && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.build:clean: taskkill /f /im java.exe 2>nul && npm run cap:build && cd android && powershell -Command "(Get-Content 'app\capacitor.build.gradle') -replace 'JavaVersion.VERSION_21', 'JavaVersion.VERSION_17' | Set-Content 'app\capacitor.build.gradle'" && set "JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Eclipse Adoptium\jdk-17.0.17.10-hotspot" && gradlew.bat clean assembleDebug -Dorg.gradle.project.buildDir=build2
